name: NAFFTA: SET THE STEPPES ALIGHT
description:
NAFFTA: SET THE STEPPES ALIGHT

Equipped with fire-rockets from a far away land and arrows tipped with naffta, an adventurer burns his way through the steppes. Is he there for a reason? Or is he just passing through...

NOTE: It is highly recommended that you play the game in windowed mode and do not resize or maximise the window. The game has been made to look its best at this resolution. Of course, you can choose not to, if you so please.

Also, this game's soundtrack was made by the AMAZING band Turku: Nomads of the Silk Road
